title: Zed's swirly shadows vfx
body: What are the swirly shadowy vfx that Zed has at all times? Is it his passive or is it just a part of the model, per se?

replies.body:
I believe its just some VFX to augment his model and make him look more 'shadowy'.
Much the same that Wolf's body is also part of the champion but not actually part of the model.

But I'm not a Zed player, all I ever see of him is a big red X over my health bar, so I could be wrong. :P
